reviews.title: the only hard drive I will need from my office.
reviews.review_text: I love this hard drive. since it's able to do so, I have my chromebook, ps3, Xbox 360, and my phone.. backed up to this drive. it has a mode where you can switch it to either within one device or among many. this hard drive keeps my files backed up safely and is able to move between devices with ease.

reviews.title: It's a great little drive and for its capacity it
reviews.review_text: This is an SSD drive that connects through your USB, “A” or “C” port 3.2. Comes with two highspeed cables one with C to C, other A to C. What I like? • Small light weight being an SSD. • No movable parts to wear out (“maybe connectors”, if you are highly abusive). • Quite • No annoying blue lights distracting you like so many products have now. • Power is generated through the device hooked up to (no extra power cord/adaptor) What I don't like? No way to recover data if a critical failure occurs, it's an SSD. Use a back up program or service there's a lot of free ones out there. Conclusion? It's a great little drive and for its capacity it's a good buy.
Exactly what I needed when I needed it. The fact that it comes with its own case is a bonus.

reviews.title: Pretty good for a Wii U
reviews.review_text: I've been using for my Wii U and it's been working great

reviews.title: great storage
reviews.review_text: it's a great little drive for my laptop my laptop only has 80 gb so 500 GB portable hard drive was perfect for me

reviews.title: 1 Big Flaw, but Good for the Price
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because i needed more storage on my computer, but i plan to upgrade in a few months due to Windows 10 end of support on an already aging computer, because buying a interal ssd to fit my exact motherboard wasn't worth it for only a short time. Overall, I've found the onn external SSD to be a mixed bag. The presentation was great when i opened the box. The drive came in a carrying case with 2 cables. The speeds, while not the fastest, exceeded expectations, and it is miles ahead of my old early 2000s HHD. It's lightweight and easy to carry if you want the same offline storage on your work and home computer. That all being said, it's got 1 big drawback, that being a huge discrepancy in storage capacity. It's listed as a 500GB drive, but mine only has 466GB. Normally, a slight discrepancy is common in budget storage devices sold today, maybe by a few GB or maybe 10 or 15 at worst, but a discrepancy of 34GB that's a lot of missing storage.
so far seems great, i apparently have a bug from some old thing that says it is 9 gig but in reality its just 14, but thats my problem to figure out, the product works well...
Did not know it would not work on tv usb port because of Xfat file system instead of fat 32 but can still be useful as another backup for all my files. Always something to learn you didn't know.

reviews.title: Never got to use it for the intended purpose.
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to use for a project. Unfortunately, the adapter needed to use it didn't arrive until 2 days AFTER I needed it. Leaving me forced to purchase something else. I ordered BOTH ITEMS at the same time. The delivery kept getting pushed back. So now I have something that I no longer need. Maybe I'll just return it. I knew at the time I needed an adapter to use it and that's why I ordered them together. Maybe you could consider adding an apple adapter to switch it from a usb C to apple lightening adapter.

reviews.title: Good deal for some, but not all!
reviews.review_text: It was okay but not what I thought it was. It was not fast enough and my devices did not even recognize it. Still, it's a good price and a good deal for someone not too picky as I am, lol! Also it's very light and you can take it anywhere.

reviews.title: pretty good so far
reviews.review_text: this is as advertised and it's pretty cool too

reviews.title: No help, no software nothing.
reviews.review_text: No software, no software site, no help. No should buy

reviews.title: Not for Tesla's
reviews.review_text: Returning it, doesn't work with my Tesla

reviews.title: Small yet large storage external drive
reviews.review_text: It is super easy to set up, plug in and format. It holds a ton for it's compact size making it easy to carry around all the data you need without having to have a laptop or desktop. You can use it to back up your files so you have something to fall back on if you lose the original!

reviews.title: Small and fast!
reviews.review_text: I received the 500GB version. The plastic housing feels cheap, which is one of the two things I don't like about it so far. It's really light, which is great. As long as the plastic housing can handle being in a backpack, etc it should be good. This unit is fast, which is fabulous. I haven't tried moving videos yet, but I did move an entire folder filled with graphic design assets and it moved it easily in under a minute. Felt like seconds. The other thing I don't like is the 500GB size. We need terabytes of storage today, so this is much too small. But when they make the terabyte sizes, I say buy one asap. Until then only buy if you need this small amount of back up or added storage space. Thank you for allowing me to test and review this for you onn. and Home Tester Club, it's a great find.

reviews.title: Ultra-Fast Portable Solid-State Drive
reviews.review_text: I really like the onn. Ultra-Fast Portable Solid-State Drive. It is super light and fits in the palm of my hand. I love that is comes with a compact case that fits the drive and both included cables. My pictures and videos from my laptop computer transferred very quickly onto the Solid-State Drive. I'm very happy with the onn. Ultra-Fast Portable Solid-State Drive and highly recommend it store your photos and videos.

reviews.title: Great price for a 500gb Solid State Drive
reviews.review_text: Great price for a 500gb Solid State Drive. And a great item for backup as I use it for my spare Laptop. Seems to have enough speed although I'm not in any rush. I have used other ONN products - such as SD Cards - for some time and they all work just fine. And priced right!

reviews.title: Fast speed
reviews.review_text: I was sent this Keep onn. Ultra fast portable solid-state drive 259 GB to test out complimentary in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. First off I love that is comes with its own travel carrying case and two cords, one that is a usb to usb-c and the other being usb-c to usb-c, great for on the go. It's ultra lightweight, I did notice that the material on the sides felt somewhat squishy when you squeezed it so I would be cautious with it not to accidentally put anything heavy on it and to keep it in the carrying case at all times when not in use. Fast transfer speed, it connected to my husbands android galaxy s22 phone right away with you no issues, however my iPhone 14 pro max I could not get it to connect to. When attempting to connect it to my computer I had to run a windows update before the drive was recognized, initially said not enough power to use drive - worked fine after windows update and restart.

reviews.title: A dream to use if you travel often!
reviews.review_text: Quick, easy, and super lightweight- this little hard drive does the job! Easily recognized on my PC, and moved items like photos and movies lightning fast. I also appreciated the extra double usbC sided cord, which makes moving around hundreds of photos from my phone even easier. It's super lightweight design makes it pocket/purse friendly as well, with a little hole for a keychain. It also comes with an easily packable hard case if you prefer a little protection. All in all, a great little product if you're looking for storage on the go.

reviews.title: Perfect for photos and video!!!
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this product. I am a mom and being a mom means LOTS of photos and videos bog down my phone. I have always struggled with a safe way to take my photos and videos off my phone without having to pay a monthly fee for cloud space. This product was the answer! It is perfect for storing all those memories without worrying about cloud space. I have been able to remove 3 years of photos ans videos and still have space to spare! 10 out of 10 - highly reccomend!!!

reviews.title: Very convenient storage device
reviews.review_text: This hard drive itself is very lightweight and slim as well as visually appealing. There is a. Hole that you could hook the hard tube on to something to make travel easier. There is 2 included cables for it. 1 usb c to usb c and the other usb a to usb a for those computer and devices that may not have a usb c port. I'm glad that was thought of. This all comes in a hard cover protective zip up case with 2 mesh pockets on the inside that will keep your hard drive and cord secure. Everything especially the case is good quality. Very happy with this.

reviews.title: Great for Gamers!
reviews.review_text: My gaming laptop has 256GB of SSD and 1TB of HDD, but I've already filled it up. I was really happy to be able to try this portable SSD. I was happy with the accessories that came with it; the case feels sturdy, and I appreciate the inclusion of a USB-C cord and a regular USB cord. I was able to play video games stored on the SSD card with very little difficulties. I played the new Hogwarts game (almost 70 GB!!!) on medium settings with no buffering.

reviews.title: Good backup SSD
reviews.review_text: This is a good backup solid state drive. It is fast as it is advertised. It also has much more capicity than a typical USB thumb drive. The capcity of the 250G gives it a lot of room for files (ppt, videos, pictures). I tested it with using it as a portable game drive. While it would only hold 1-3 of the larger games, it does do a good job at holding smaller games. The response time loading from it is also good. For the curret cost it is well worth it.

reviews.title: So much storage for such a small device
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised at how much could fit on this. I recently broke the screen on my laptop amd needed to get files off of it quickly. I was able to hook up a monitor and use this to move files and pictures over to my spare. It is easy to use and so portable. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Onn 250gb Portable Drive
reviews.review_text: The Onn portable ssd come with a pretty nice case and two cables, which is nice. Its advertised as 250gbs but usable memory is about 230gb. The drive works as intended and looks nice. It is plastic and is a bit light, which is both good and bad. Doesn't feel premium, it's more toy like. Overall decent portable storage drive, nothing more nothing less.

reviews.title: Lightweight and lightning fast!
reviews.review_text: The worst thing about this is that the actual available storage was less than the advertised available storage. Other than that minor hiccup It connected to my Chromebook quickly and efficiently and I was able to transfer all of my videos and free up some space on my device.

reviews.title: Plenty of storage
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying this SSD drive is the perfect size to take anywhere. You can put it in your center console in your car, your purse, and keep it in your computer desk with plenty of extra room. I was able to transfer all my photos/videos to the SSD drive from my laptop and still have plenty of room left over for future images. Then I copied everything to my PC with the USB cable provided with the kit. I can store so many files on the drive it's amazing, and the dive is small enough to fit in my hand. I highly recommend this product especially if you work from home, in any field working with computers, or just need extra storage you can take anywhere. It's sleek design, two USB cables, and heavy duty, but light case are an added bonus.

reviews.title: Love this little portable hard drive
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing light weight portal hard drive, the transfer speeds are extremely fast, I like how I can plug it directly into my android phone or tablet, I was able to transfer 30gb and it took less than a few minutes, my other drives would of taken hours, I love the protective zipper case, which even has room for the included cables, this drive works great

reviews.title: Lightning speed transfers!
reviews.review_text: This hard drive is amazing. Its exactly what I needed. I plugged it in and it was plug and play. It opened right away. I then took a high resolution photo that was 5500 by 4250 and it transferred within seconds. The transfer speed is really good which is exactly what I was looking for in a hard drive. The plug and play topped off with the fast transfer speeds made this a great product. I also really love the slim compactness of this hard drive. Extremely light and comes with a case so I don't misplace it as well as for protection. Overall I give this a 5 out of 5. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.review_text: This product is super easy to use. Just plug into the computer and quickly downloads everything to save as a back up. This is super important these days because you always need a back up. I love the case to store everything too. I would definitely recommend this product to others.

reviews.title: SlimShady
reviews.review_text: I canNOT believe this thing holds a half a terabyte of information! I've never had a hard drive that was so light and small! It fits in the palm of my hand! I LOVE this new ultra fast, ultra sleek hard drive. Highly recommend to any consumer that is looking for a portable hard drive with a lot of memory.
This portable HD is well worth your time purchase. I will buy again

reviews.title: onn. Ultra-Fast Portable SSD 250GB
reviews.review_text: The onn. Ultra-Fast Portable SSD 250GB was an awesome product. When it arrived at my house, I was pleasantly surprised to received this great product! What a super useful portable device!

reviews.title: Lots of room
reviews.review_text: I have very large drawing files and this was able to hold them all plus with tons of room leftover. I can not fill the space up. It is perfect for school and comes with a nice carrying case. Easy to use or transfer files.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I moved all my pics and home videos onto this and it cleared up SO MUCH SPACE on my laptop! It's so small and compact so it doesn't take it up much space! Gives me a peace of mind knowing all my memories are safe!

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: Great product loved how easy it was to setup and use being I've never used one of these before .. it had a lot of storage and made me feel good about being able to keep so much without crowding my devices

reviews.title: Decent purchase
reviews.review_text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift to my son who is starting to show great interest in photography. He has not used this yet, however it came with everything described and looks new.

reviews.title: Great to have
reviews.review_text: This is right what I needed. It is so handy & let me free up some space on my device. I like the size of the product also. I think adding more colors would be a great idea. I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.title: Super Fast
reviews.review_text: This ultra fast portable solid state drive is a must when your device starts running out of space. Super handy to have and super easy to use. It let's me expand my storage capabilities giving me more room for treasured memories. Overall A+

reviews.title: Portable
reviews.review_text: If anyone that work from home or school or take a lot pictures or video or need portable sd to save their their work this would be great for them or if someone is photographer

reviews.title: Customer Service Failure
reviews.review_text: My item is still under review, has to be ready by the ps5 I received a call from the pickup dept. I informed the young woman that I was at the customer service desk. She instructed me to come to the pickup door on the side and call when I was there. I called. The mailbox was full, four employees walked by and didn't even acknowledge my presence. Mind you, it was 32 degrees outside. I stood there for 15 minutes waiting for one of the employees to stop leaning and sitting (in clear view) to come to the door and engage me. If I return, I won't use the unprofessional pickup service. This was a horrible customer service experience. If I could leave zero stars, I would. Training is definitely needed! Or a more customer service oriented staff needs to be hired to replace the crew that I encountered.

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: This product was great for giving me additional storage on my computer and saving my personal memories to a compact device.

reviews.title: So so
reviews.review_text: it took me a minute to relieve what i was holding. After that everything fell into place. worked that a charm with my chromebook.

reviews.title: Great onn device
reviews.review_text: Great device! I love that it connects to my phone and saves all my photos so I can have the extra space to save more photos!

reviews.title: Beautiful product
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing. I would recommend it to anybody who is looking for an external hard drive to store their items on.

reviews.title: NOT GOOD!!
reviews.review_text: was doing fine now it just keeps crashing my laptop and, of course, it's past the return date. Very aggravating!

reviews.title: Lightweight
reviews.review_text: Lightweight portable hard drive that I used to transfer 4K videos off of my iPhone for storage and upload purposes gets the job done for big events.
Super small as fast set up! I purchased an adapter so I could save my pictures and files directly from my Phone without having to log into my computer. I love
Won't take a lot of large files at once like other drives do

reviews.title: Very great
reviews.review_text: I really like this product, it's useful and very tolerant to handle,

reviews.review_text: It works very well. Made my stuff faster and gave me more storage. It works on my tablet.

reviews.review_text: It was a good price and it worked great

reviews.review_text: Light and compact. Comes with the case which is awesome.

reviews.review_text: Came in on time, enough space for my Aunts pictures and family pictures.

reviews.review_text: item package shows 1tb it is actually 500gb thats less rhen 1/2 of what was paid for, to too it off the system dies nit communucate witg this drive at all.

reviews.title: No instructions

reviews.title: Great item
reviews.review_text: nice small unit you can carry in your pocket and it comes with a carrying case as well

reviews.title: Not what it appears
reviews.review_text: The price is outstanding. Size and case make it perfect for a work bag. My issue is your not getting what you paid for. This product is touted as 250GB but when i looked at it it is 233GB thats a 17GB difference. If you dig deeper if your tech savvy enough you see operating systems/cache is about 2GB so this is 235GB not 250. Where is my other 15GB of storage.

reviews.title: broken within 2 weeks
reviews.review_text: broke within a week or two of use, cant download anything to the drive and it says its "full"

reviews.title: Surprised it works
reviews.review_text: This is nothing more than Walmarts low quality attempt of SSDs. It mounts weirdly if at all and causes constant file explorer crashes. I'd recommend getting a WD HDD for 5 less but 100% more reliable

reviews.title: 250GB but only get 230gb
reviews.review_text: Feels cheap. And will connect to my laptop. But not my iPad like my other SSD. So this one I don't like. It also says 250GB but when formatting it comes out to 230GB. I had to return. It works but I honestly don't know how long it will last.

reviews.title: Device malfunctioned
reviews.review_text: I was using this as my personal drive to save important documents on but it malfunctioned, so now now I can't access them anymore or even use the device!
It worked for a few days, but then randomly it just stopped working. It said the storage was at 100% but there was nothing on it. Cant reformat it, delete the contents or anything.

reviews.title: Great speed transfer
reviews.review_text: Works good and I can transfer my files faster. The size of the hard disk is great it fits in the side pocket of my backpack.

reviews.title: Santa was good to him.
reviews.review_text: it was a gift for my grandson. I haven't seen much of him since so I am thinking he liked it.
